comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: This is not happening for the first time I guess?When Bitcoins were around 20k usd, it once went down to 3k usd and they again it started recovering.Same is happening now.I would suggest all the members to not panic and show some patience.Give some time to market and wait.Once Bitcoins start gaining the pace and rise in price, all altcoins will also follow it’s lead.In the meantime buy as much as Bitcoins if possible and wait for the market to skyrocket.Hope everyone will make good profits when this bearish season ends.

I think we will see one or two big drops again before we see bullish periods that will push the price to the next record! comments.author: Rengga Jati
comments.body: Quote from: smartaction on June 13, 2022, 03:58:52 PMCryptocurrency is now in a big crashing. And whole crypto marketcap now under $1Trillion. What will the next? and How long do you think it will take for the market to recover? This is the era of the Bearish market and I think that this crash will not end here. There is still a possibility to crash again until it reaches the dipping price. Although no one will know how much exactly the dip will be in this bearish season. This is likely still in the cycle of the bearish-bullish market, so no need to panic. We have been experiencing this several times. Moreover in 2018, the market was also the same, like this. I also still hold several coins that have been dropping very significantly, none to do right now besides waiting for the next bullish era. Yeah, I believe that after this bearish market, the bullish will come again. But we must be still very patient because the bullish market will not probably come in several months later, but years. Commonly it will be starting after the Bitcoin halving if we see the graphic so far. But once more, this is a crypto market where there may be some certain possibilities and surprises.
